data.title: LANDMARKS OF PERAK. by Raja Nazrin. Shah: Very Good Hardcover (2006) signed and inscribed by author
data.meta_description: ISBN: 9789834308209 - signed and inscribed by author - Hardcover - RNS - 2006 - Condition: Very Good - No Jacket - SIGNED and inscribed by the author. Minor shelf and handling wear, overall a clean solid copy with minimal signs of use. Inscribed by author on half title page. Includes slipcase in good condition. The binding suffers minor loosening due to age and wear, but remains secure and in-tact; the pages are clean and unmarked. Secure packaging for safe delivery. 1.01 - LANDMARKS OF PERAK.
data.text:
Shipping Terms:

All domestic Standard shipments are distributed from our warehouses by OSM, then handed off to the USPS for final delivery.

2-Day Shipping is delivered by FedEx, which does not deliver to PO boxes.

International shipments are tendered to the local postal service in the destination country for final delivery â€“ We do not use courier services for international deliveries.
